# NSTU Mechatronics Club Website - Project Instructions

## Project Overview
Modern full-stack website for NSTU Mechatronics Club with stunning UI effects and gradient themes.

## Technology Stack
- **Frontend**: Next.js 14+, React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
- **Backend**: Node.js, Express
- **UI**: Framer Motion, Modern gradients, Animations

## Pages
- Landing Page
- Members Page
- Events Page
- Projects Page
- Achievements Page

## Architecture
- Component-based design
- Modular folder structure
- Separated frontend/backend
- Reusable UI components
